text: ( Source : MARTA - Metropolitan Atlanta Rapid Transit Authority ) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE CONTACT: Alisa T. Jackson Oct. 15, 2015 404 .804.1717 The MARTA Police Department has launched #BlowtheWhistle, a comprehensive campaign to help customers
